title: Zucchini pancakes with fresh cottage cheese
directions: Mix the zucchini with the onion, eggs, baking powder and flour to form a thick batter.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil and fry 2 small pancakes of the batter on a medium setting.
Repeat with the rest of the oil and the batter. Mix the cottage cheese with 4 tablespoons mint, lemon zest and juice.
Divide the pancakes on plates and put the cottage cheese in the middle on it. Garnish with the remaining mint and serve warm.
